title: Inflammatory Radio Ads From 2 Trump-Aligned Groups Are Airing in Battleground States
description: The ad campaigns, totaling over $6.5 million, talk about “anti-white bigotry” and transgender care for children.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender

media:content.media:credit: Cooper Neill for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A group started by Stephen Miller, who was a top adviser to President Donald J. Trump, is placing inflammatory ads on radio stations in competitive midterm markets.
